description: This glorious, elegant restaurant is surrounded by a delightful garden where guests can dine à la carte or order copious appetisers in the summer months. The recipes focus on the gastronomic traditions of the Piedmont reinterpreted with a modern flavour, as well as more contemporary dishes with original combinations. Meat and fish dishes (including fish from the lake) always feature, alongside some of the restaurant’s classic house specialities.
